description.ko: 플로라-9는 유기적 생물학과 고속 데이터 아키텍처의 획기적인 합성을 보여줍니다. 이 디지털 자연 표본은 꽃잎 내부에 생체 발광 신경망을 갖추고 있으며, 포스트 바이오 생태계에서 생명체의 진화를 반영합니다.
description.en: FLORA-9 represents a groundbreaking synthesis of organic biology and high-speed data architecture. This digital nature specimen features bioluminescent neural networks within its petals, reflecting the evolution of life in a post-biological ecosystem.

prompt: Hyper-realistic macro photography of FLORA-9, a futuristic cybernetic plant species, translucent iridescent petals embedded with glowing fiber-optic veins, neon liquid nutrients flowing through crystalline stems, digital pollen particles shimmering in a dark techno-organic environment, soft bokeh background of a data-forest, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, intricate mechanical botanical details, ethereal digital nature aesthetic.
